text: Stephan Fransen and Wesley Koolhof were the defending champions, but chose not to participate. Máximo González and Guido Pella won the title, defeating Pere Riba and Jordi Samper-Montaña in the final, 2–6, 7–6(7–3), [10–5]. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Main Draw Challenger Ciudad de Guayaquil - Doubles
title: 2014 Challenger Ciudad de Guayaquil – Doubles
